message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. This is a fantastic deal, considering its true value to you is $1200000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $1100000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $900000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $980000. This is a very competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $1200000. I believe it's a fair compromise, and I'm eager to hear your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $980000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make another serious offer. I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1200000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $920000. I'm willing to make another concession, though. I'm counteroffering at $960000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you'll find it hard to pass up. I'm eager to hear your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $960000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I was thinking more along the lines of $940000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1200000. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $940000. I'm willing to make one more concession, though. I'm counteroffering at $950000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you'll find it hard to pass up. I'm eager to hear your thoughts.
